metadata.name: set_target_swf_3
metadata.description: Tests ActionSetTarget opcode (0x8B) - Changes execution context to a named movie clip. Comprehensive edge case testing including invalid targets, _root, slash notation, and empty string returns to main timeline.
missing_features: MovieClip hierarchy (named sprites, nested clips) requires display list infrastructure available only in graphics mode
In NO_GRAPHICS mode, only _root is available as a valid target - all other target names are treated as 'not found'
